body.name: ZINUS 12 Inch Ultra Cooling Gel Memory Foam Mattress / Cool-to-Touch Soft Knit Cover / Pressure Relieving / CertiPUR-US Certified / Bed-in-a-Box / All-New / Made in USA, Full White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 39 mins
features: General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room. In cold temperature, at delivery, your mattress may take a bit longer to return to full sized from its compressed state.The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding.General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room. In cold temperature, at delivery, your mattress may take a bit longer to return to full sized from its compressed state.The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding.

ULTRA PERFORMANCE – Optimized for perfectly temperature-regulated sleep, this mattress features gel-infused memory foam and an upgraded Cool-to-Touch Soft-Knit cover to keep you cool and comfortable with three times the cooling benefits

MORE COOLING POWER - A top layer of ultra-cooling gel memory foam paired with our patented 7-zone ventilation system for extra airflow and a stretchable, soft-knit fabric cover with a cool to the touch feeling improves ventilation and offers more air-flow. REFRESHING SLEEP – We infused premium green tea into every layer for improved freshness from the first night to the hundredth.Top:Gel-infused Memory Form

MADE IN USA OF US FOAM AND GLOBAL MATERIAL – Straight out of our first ever, state-of-the-art, North American production facility in Georgia. CERTIPUR US CERTIFIED – Highest quality foam is CertiPUR US Certified for durability, performance, and content

EXPERTLY PACKAGED – Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
body.description: Upgrades don’t have to cost an arm and a leg, and the new and improved Ultra Cooling Gel Memory Foam Mattress triples cooling performance to upgrade your quality of sleep without breaking the bank or a sweat. Redesigned from the very first layer up, this new mattress delivers three times more cooling benefits than our standard cooling gel mattress- perfect for sweaty sleepers. So how did we fit so much cooling performance into this new mattress? Supportive base foam is topped with a layer of cooling gel-infused foam to regulate your body temperature for an even cooler night of sleep. Meanwhile our patented 7-zone ventilation system in the top layer allows for better airflow plus the benefit of pressure relief in just the right spots. We wrap all this extra “coolness” in a Cool-to-Touch Soft-Knit cover to add even more ventilation. This performance fabric delivers a cool to the touch feeling to cool you down while you sleep but never chilly. And with our premium green tea infusion now in every layer, this mattress ships nice and fresh to your door- and stays fresh every night after. With our 10-year warranty, unbeatable price and improved construction, this upgraded mattress is the “coolest” choice you’ll make.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3x the cooling power As cool as it gets Don't let the heat (or a sub-par mattress) wreck your sleep. We've combined our coolest ingredients yet into our Ultra Cooling Gel Mattress for unparalleled comfort and temperature regulation. Sleep like never before with the same relief you get from cannonballing into the pool on a hot summer day.

Unwind in cool comfort Comfort that fits your body When you combine our patented 7-zone pressure-relief system with specially formulated cooling gel foam, you get peaceful, temperature regulated sleep. Experience extra support under your shoulders, hips, and knees, all atop durable Zinus Base Foam layers infused with green tea for freshness. Only the best of the best Made with the finest CertiPUR-US certified foams, a luxurious, high performance cooling cover, and premium construction, this exceptional mattress redefines "chilling out".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mattress within the price
reviews.reviewText: Great mattress for sleep on, soft but also support your back. The issue for me is the cooling gel on the surface top, I need more time to use to the mattress especially in the winter without air conditioner time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is most possible the most comfortable mattress I have ever had! I'm getting older now and have a little arthritis and the one I was sleeping on was making me wake up sore in the morning and so when I was fed up with feeling sore in the morning, I decided to try to buy a mattress online and luckily I picked a great one. They say it inflates better if it's warm so I put a space heater in the room and within 6 hours it went from 4 in high to the full 12-inch high mattress that I ordered. It is just fantastic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very please with this mattress. I have owned this type of mattress before and I have to say that they felt hot especially during summer but this one doesn’t. Its cooling gel does actually work. My back doesn’t hurt and it is super comfortable. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Firm but nice
reviews.reviewText: The only reason I’m giving 4 stars instead of 5 is that these mattresses are next to impossible to return. This is my first memory foam and it’s not the perfect mattress for me. But it’s not like I can return it. That being said, it’s good enough. But I wish for the price it was perfect. I got the 12 inch. It’s a pretty firm mattress. I’d like a little softer mattress. You don’t sink into this at all so if you like firm, this is for you. I do not wake up with any bank pain though. Probably a hybrid would have been a better choice for me. But I still like it.As for the cooling effect…it does not necessarily feel cool to me. But it’s definitely not hot or warm so I’d say it does the job. The feel of the fabric is nice. And it expanded immediately and fast.For those liking a firm mattress I would say this is top choice. I just didn’t know what I liked but that is not the manufacturers fault and it’s still a lovely bed. Just wish there was an easy exchange policy. But that’s the price you pay for a bed in a box verses an expensive store. I definitely would still recommend this bed.Also to the manufacturer, there was a dead baby ring neck snake in the plastic. Interesting. Kind of gross. Wasn’t touching the mattress thankfully. It was an interesting surprise. But you might want to check your warehouse lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a mattress in a box for a while for a piece of property we have. We use the property monthly so I wanted a good mattress that was affordable. At home we have the hybrid tempurpedic, however, we were not willing to spend that kind of money for something we will use a few times per month. With that said, my husband had a serious neck injury years back and I have a bad back. So we prefer firm mattresses and we relied heavily on the reviews. I will say I am glad so far that I went with this mattress. The three factors that came into play in order to make a decision was the reviews, the price, and that it is made in the USA.We have slept on this mattress only twice but my goodness is it comfortable. It is firm yet soft. hard to explain. It is very supportive and there is no motion transfer with this mattress, which is a huge bonus. I hope this matrress holds up. I will come back in about 6-8 months to provide an update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget option
reviews.reviewText: After reading all of the reviews on here, I was super sketched out about buying this. I had an old memory foam mattress that I had bought at BJ’s wholesale 15 years ago. Don’t judge me! I was worried about replacing it. This thing popped right open with no issues I let it sit for the full 72 hours actually a little more than that it went right into shape like it’s supposed to. It was the full 10 inches which is the size that I bought and there’s no issues Whatsoever. Being that it’s only the 10 inch one obviously it’s not the most comfortable ever but for the price it can’t be beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Given as a gift. Recipient says it sleeps perfectly—-cool and extremely comfortable. Great product for the price—-appears very well constructed. Would definitely purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Failure to Expand after 26hrs- Must wait 72hrs to see what happens!
reviews.reviewText: 26hrs unboxed and that is the picture you see; however, I could tell this was going to be situation just as soon as the mattress unrolled from the compression wrapper. Love the feel of this mattress and very excited to finally get some rest because it’s cool and comfy but also firm, but it looks like a swing and a miss…. The first person at Amazon I talked told me that I could return it, I laughed at them and said how…? They transferred me to the person I am hold with now, who is currently on another line looking for my options while I listen to bad elevator music, been trying to get help on what to do next or try and return the defective mattress for over an hour now and have talked to a real person for about 8mins of it…. I was informed that in the fine print somewhere it says we must wait 72hrs to see if the mattress fully expands, and was informed to call back when it hasn’t. Like they knew it was not going to expand, it was a little strange. I asked how I was to return it and they said because it is out of box and a big item that Amazon would take care of that- kind of interested to see how. I followed up that it is strange to return a mattress and if the one I purchased was a return- they stuttered and then said no it should be new. Here’s to hoping! I will update this review in a few days after we see what happens.
